trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.1.1v.last(#1)}<0.976 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.1.1v.last(#1)}>1.216
trigger.name: +1.1V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.1.8v.last(#1)}<1.608 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.1.8v.last(#1)}>1.984
trigger.name: +1.8V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.3.3v.last(#1)}<2.928 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.3.3v.last(#1)}>3.648
trigger.name: +3.3V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.3.3vsb.last(#1)}<2.928 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.3.3vsb.last(#1)}>3.648
trigger.name: +3.3VSB Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.5v.last(#1)}<4.480 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.5v.last(#1)}>5.536
trigger.name: +5 V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}<10.706 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}>13.250
trigger.name: +12V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.fan_1.last(#1)}<784.000 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.fan_1.last(#1)}>33856.000
trigger.name: FAN 1 Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.fan_2.last(#1)}<784.000 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.fan_2.last(#1)}>33856.000
trigger.name: FAN 2 Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.temp.last(#1)}<-5.000 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.temp.last(#1)}>75.000
trigger.name: System Temp Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}<2.928 or {Template IPMI Supermicro H8DGT:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}>3.648
trigger.name: VBAT Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}
